title: Subharambha
overview: Subharambha revolves around Subhomita, a struggling musician, as she juggles her life, her family, and her passion for music. After a chance meeting with Mainak, her childhood admirer, things start looking up for Subhomita. But a new challenge is always around the corner. Will Subhomita follow her passion or will life force her to quit her music?
